channel.title: Pi client nullpointer help please?
channel.description:
ive been trying to find out whats wrong with this client. but i cnt seem to find out what is wrong with it..:/
This is the cmd from 2 secs after i logged into my server:
[code] at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:115) at client.startUp(client.java:9172) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6174) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Loaded 525 graphics... Loaded Compressed Models.. Loading animations Loaded the flo. 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Error: T - 123,0 - 36,36 java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException item.title: Pi client nullpointer help please?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You’re missing a sprite. I’m not sure which. I remember seeing this in a couple servers.
But yeah, you’re missing a sprite, find out which one is missing and place it in your sprites directory.
To find it, you’re probably gonna have to search the word “Sprite” or “new Sprite” in Client.java

Read full topic
